text:
In 3. Configure Tomcat, server.xml details are outdated, and "digest" attribute
is incorrectly named as "Digest".

In "Using Digested Passwords", method name "Digest" should be "digest", and use
of JDBCRealm class as an application is not mentioned.
creator: pbwest@powerup.com.au
